root.name: expand()
root.description: Increases the size of an array. By default, this function doubles the size of the array, but the optional newSize parameter provides precise control over the increase in size.

parameter.label: array
parameter.description: booleans[], bytes[], chars[], ints[], or Strings[]

parameter.label: newSize
parameter.description: positive int: new size for the array

root.returns: Array (the same datatype as the input)
